meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by necrosis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor identified the necrotic tissue in the patient's leg.
meanings.sent2: The necrotic cells were slowly spreading throughout the body.
meanings.sent3: The necrotic plant in the garden was beyond saving.
meanings.sent4: The necrotic relationship between the two countries was irreparable.
meanings.sent5: The necrotic smell coming from the garbage bin was unbearable.

meanings.sent1: The necrotic substance was harmful to the surrounding cells.
meanings.sent2: The necrotic venom of the snake quickly paralyzed its prey.
meanings.sent3: The necrotic cake left in the sun was a disaster waiting to happen.
meanings.sent4: The necrotic decision led to the downfall of the company.
meanings.sent5: The necrotic wound on the tree attracted insects and decay.
